Name: Emerson
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of skewered Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: The botanical notes of old tom with herbal vermouth, zesty citrus and sweet maraschino. Reminiscent of a Last Word without Chartreuse.
History: Recipe adapted from Jacques Straub's 1913 Straub's Manual Of Mixed Drinks .
Nutrition: One serving of Emerson contains 165 calories
